channel.title: VanityPS l 24/7 VPS hosted l Vbulletin Forums l Alot of Customs
channel.description:
[size=10pt][CENTER][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img839/9987/vanityfixedzpsc7a739c4.png[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/343sprm.png[/img] [URL=http://www.vanity-ps.com]Website[/URL] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/343sprm.png[/img] [URL=http://www.vanity-ps.com]Forums[/URL] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/20ti1ko.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://vanity-ps.com/Vanity.htm"]Webclient[/URL]
Welcome to Vanity! Our RSPS has a lot to offer,Ranging from lots of customs,skilling opportunities, bossing, donator benefits.
We worked hard to get the server up and running, We putted in a lot of costums to make the game like there is no other one, With a great team who are working day and night to keep the server fun and great to play. We from Vanity want our players to have the best game experience they ever wanted and searched for! Like i said above we got a lot to offer with a great amount of custom items and a great team to support the community. We are even got a wiki that got a lot of guides to help if you are stuck with something and there is a lot of useful information to in prove your knowledge about the game. The staff team we got are people who are in the project since we started it all of them have a great RSPS experience and knowledge of RSPS. So with a great game and a great staff team we are happy to invite YOU to join us and get the feeling of our server, And were you want to be all day and night long to become the LEGEND of our server,
So why is this server great? And why should you play the server?
[center]
• Professional and known staff
• 24/7 Active Pking
• Pk-points with rewards
• Great support staff & development team
• Duel arena
• Fight caves
• Minigames
• Donator Island/Donator Island Expansion
• Bounty Hunter with Targets/Special drops with EP%
• 9 Character Ranks
• Amazing Vote Shop/ With Tickets
• Active pking area
• PvP weapons: Chaotics, Dragon claws, Hand cannon, Custom colored whips
• Barrows
• Fully Working Skilling & Combat System
• Oppertunities to grow
• Fast growing community
• Wiki
• Easy to start playing
• Active forums
• Dicing
• Free For All to host party's
• All kind of bosses
• Auto Vote
• Great vote rewards
• Pkpoints Package/ Donator Pin
• Lots of donation items
And we got so much more to offer that i kind even put it all here.[/center]
Offcourse PKing is the one of the most important things we got on the server thats why we wanted that one of the most fun things to do with a 100 % working switches and curses and different kinds of mage books to get the best pk experience you have ever wanted to have, And to reward your hard work of fighting and the time you have go true to become the number one pker of vanity we got made a shop to change the pk points you won in to great items you can sell or use to train or to become a better pker offcourse, But because we don’t want to leave the other people behind we made a vote shop to change the tickets you voted for in to great items that you can use or sell to the community and offcourse to show to the community what you have earned!
Well i can keep on telling you why you should join and become a part of the community.
But the best way to really know what vanity really just come over and see for yourself!
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img600/4853/12918242.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img96/393/a17c4916b413319699d3462.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img90/3599/51b98f4ac0557de2340a3f4.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img543/7537/pinkphat.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img706/7929/23583004.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img560/7411/chardi.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img200/7782/turmg.png[/img] [IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img831/1218/informationbar.png[/img]
We hope to see you soon!
Best regards.[/CENTER][/size]

They arn´t costums

item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

l:

Since when are slayer helm and dragon kite customs?

There was a time when dragon kiteshields were just an idea, and that’s how they looked. Slayer helms, idk.

item.title: VanityPS l 24/7 VPS hosted l Vbulletin Forums l Alot of Customs
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Show us a picture of you inside of a working Castle Wars minigame, and then you’ll gain more players. Simply listing the names of minigames you may or may not have just helps me practice my reading skills.
Good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: VanityPS l 24/7 VPS hosted l Vbulletin Forums l Alot of Customs

item.title: VanityPS l 24/7 VPS hosted l Vbulletin Forums l Alot of Customs
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Where’s all the costumes?

Looks like an oldschool delta mixed with a PI. Good luck, I guess.

Read full topic
item.source: VanityPS l 24/7 VPS hosted l Vbulletin Forums l Alot of Customs
